nodes.name: Forfeiter

nodes.documentation:
@notice Owner can call this function to update the needed contracts for checking conditions
@dev contract addresses are stored in proxy
nodes.name: initialize
checkStatus
forfeitGame
checkPlayersKitties
checkAmountSupporters
didPlayersStartGame
Forfeiter

nodes.documentation:
@notice Owner can call this function to update the needed contracts for checking conditions
@dev contract addresses are stored in proxy
nodes.name: initialize
checkStatus
forfeitGame
checkPlayersKitties
checkAmountSupporters
didPlayersStartGame

params.gamePreStartTime: uint256 time when game starts 2 min countdown
params.supportersBlack: uint256 amount of supporters in black corner
params.supportersRed: uint256 amount of supporters in red corner

checkPlayersKitties(uint256,uint256,uint.details: it can also be owned by kittie hell

params.blackStarted: bool if black player hit start
params.gameStartTime: uint256 time when 2 min countdown ends
params.redStarted: bool if red player hit start

initialize().details: contract addresses are stored in proxy

checkAmountSupporters(uint256,uint256,ui.notice: checks for correct amount of supporters in each side when prestart time is reached

checkPlayersKitties(uint256,uint256,uint.notice: checks that the each player still own listed kittie

didPlayersStartGame(uint256,bool,bool,ui.notice: Check if any of players did not hit start when game start time is reached

initialize().notice: Owner can call this function to update the needed contracts for checking conditions

userdoc.notice: This contracts safeguards any game instances against any unintended outcomes
